Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you really sell over ten million G?!
<PAGE>
...You're no ordinary merchant, are you...?

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You sold over a million G? ...That's amazing!
<PAGE>
I don't know much about you, but if you can
pull off sales numbers like that, you're my hero!

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You sold over a hundred thousand G?!
<PAGE>
Hmph. Not bad! But you can do better...

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... I do believe I just found me a diamond
in the rough! I love uncovering buried treasure
like this...

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't have to guess if a product is good or not.
I can sense it. I just KNOW.

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, that's enough shopping for one day. I think
I'll be headed home.

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have non-buyer's remorse. I wanted to spend
my money...but I don't have money to waste on
goods that are anything shy of perfect.

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you're out on a shopping trip, the most
shocking fate of them all is when there's simply
nothing good to buy...

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I guess it's time to throw in the towel. I hate
leaving empty-handed, but the fates didn't throw
me a deal today...

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Hmm? Did you need something from me?

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Old things have a certain "soul" to them, don't
they? It's like you can feel the spiritual residue of
those who owned them before you...

<NAME_MOB_THEOBALD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I figure, if I'm buying goods, I might as well buy
something good to eat too, you know?
